EmailTemplate.name: 201906_EMEAI_ADSB_Email_D&S_JC.201906_EMEAI_ADSB_Email_D&S_JC
EmailTemplate.subject: Civil Mandates in 2020 could affect military operations?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Do you know that by 2020 all aircraft must transmit Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) information when flying in European and US air-space? Military aircraft that do not have ADS-B out will be required to request access to fly. Don't get caught out on critical missions with red tape and forms. Honeywell can help to update your fleet if you take action now.
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/201906_EMEAI_ADSB_Email_DS_JC_201904_EMEAI_ADSB_Email_LandingPage_DS_JC.html]]>
